movies.title: Ju-on: The Beginning of the End
movies.plot: In this seventh installment of the Ju-on franchise, a school teacher visits the home of a boy who's been absent from school for a long period of time, unaware of the horrific tragedy which occurred in the boy's household many years ago.
movies.simplePlot: In this seventh installment of the Ju-on franchise, a school teacher visits the home of a boy who's been absent from school for a long period of time, unaware of the horrific tragedy which occurred in the boy's household many years ago.

biography.bio: Shô Aoyagi is an actor, known for Mr. Long (2017), The Sango Rangers (2013) and Wild Heroes (2015).
biography.name: Shô Aoyagi

biography.bio: Yoshihiko Hakamada was born on July 16, 1973 in Shizuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le royaume des chats (2002), Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993) and Another (2012).
biography.name: Yoshihiko Hakamada

biography.bio: Yasuhito Hida was born on February 5, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on Perfect Education 2: 40 Days of Love (2001), Enjo-kôsai bokumetsu undô: jigoku-hen (2004) and Samurai Fiction (1998).
biography.name: Yasuhito Hida

biography.bio: Maki Ishikawa is an actress, known for Le Soldat Dieu (2010), Natsu jikan no otonatachi (1997) and Circus Boys (1989).
biography.name: Maki Ishikawa

biography.bio: Miho Kanazawa is an actress, known for Suspect X (2008), Otome no reshipi (2014) and Kurumaisu de boku wa sora wo tobu (2012).
biography.name: Miho Kanazawa

biography.bio: Kai Kobayashi is an actor, known for Ju-on: The Final Curse (2015), Guardian of the Spirit (2016) and Ju-on: The Beginning of the End (2014).
biography.name: Kai Kobayashi

biography.bio: Yuina Kuroshima is an actress, known for Toki wo Kakeru Shôjo (2016), Sengo 70-nen: Ichiban densha ga hashitta (2015) and Night Hero Naoto (2016).
biography.name: Yuina Kuroshima

biography.bio: Daiki Miyagi is an actor, known for Prison School (2015), Ju-on: The Beginning of the End (2014) and Kyuukyoku no otoko wa dareda!? Saikyou supôtsu danshi choujou kessen 2014 (2014).
biography.name: Daiki Miyagi

biography.bio: Ayako Omura is an actress, known for Parasite Eve (1997), Help! (1995) and Gakkô no kaidan G (1998).
biography.name: Ayako Omura

biography.bio: Misaki Saisho is an actress, known for Frozen (2013), Ju-on: The Final Curse (2015) and Tag (2015).
biography.name: Misaki Saisho

biography.bio: Nozomi Sasaki was born on February 8, 1988 in Akita, Japan. She is an actress, known for My Rainy Days (2009), Saihate nite (2014) and Afuro Tanaka (2012).
biography.name: Nozomi Sasaki

biography.bio: Haori Takahashi is an actress, known for Perfect Blue (2012), Ju-on: The Beginning of the End (2014) and One Week Friends (2017).
biography.name: Haori Takahashi

biography.bio: Reina Triendl is an actress, known for Tag (2015), Itsuka Tiffany de Chôshoku wo (2015) and 10 Women in Black (2016).
biography.name: Reina Triendl
